title: Trailer Park Candy
description: Book 1 of the Trailer Park Nights Series!Hired to fix a pipe at Mrs. Kittles’s home in the Cloud Nine Trailer Park, Gary Kile has his eye on the woman’s pretty daughter, Tawny. Blonde and blue-eyed, the eighteen-year-old is about as fresh and enticing as ice cream on a hot summer’s day. Gary is more than equipped to handle tricky pipework, and quite eager for a game of seduction, taking the opportunity to make a move on the busty blonde. Will Tawny be able to resist him?Follow Tawny's naughty adventures in "Trailer Park Soda." Coming soon ...
author: Kendra Edge
